definitions.definition: A sports facility specialized for lifting weights and exercise.

definitions.example: On Wednesdays I hike; on Fridays I gym.

definitions.definition: A large room or building for indoor sports.
A type of secondary school in some European countries which typically prepares students for university.
A public place or building where Ancient Greek youths took exercise, with running and wrestling grounds, baths, and halls for conversation.
A sport involving the performance of sequences of movements requiring physical strength, flexibility, and kinesthetic awareness.
definitions.example: Gymnastics was a significant part of the physical education curriculum.

definitions.definition: Complex intellectual or artistic exercises or feats of physical agility.
